title: Hour 2 - Kristian Winfield
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Kristian Winfield
description:
Hour two Colin opens the show with his infamous "Colin's Picks". Kristian Winfield joins to talk about Kyrie Irving and the Brooklyn Nets future. The crew also talks about the legacy hit that possibly took place for Kevin Durant after Warriors win the finals.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
